name: Yakuza
description:
Yakuza is an action game developed by Amusement Vision. It was originally released in 2005. SEGA published the game. Yakuza has a Metascore of 75, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Yakuza is available on PlayStation 2.
Masayoshi Soken and Toshihiro Nagoshi produced the game. It was directed by Ryuta Ueda.
